title: Camping Safari Types
intro: Camping safaris in Africa range from highly luxurious tented experiences to raw, adventurous wilderness camping. Below are the main camping styles available, each offering a unique way to experience the African bush.

sections.title: Luxury Tented Camping

items.paragraph: Luxury tented camping involves the use of custom-made canvas tents designed to provide lodge-level comfort while maintaining a close connection to nature.
These tented camps range from 2-star to 5-star standards and are fully inclusive, featuring en-suite bathrooms, comfortable beds, quality furnishings, and personalized service.
The only real difference between a lodge and a luxury tented camp is the canvas roof — everything else offers the same level of comfort and refinement.

highlights: Lodge-style service in a natural setting

items.paragraph: Adventure camping safaris are designed for the young at heart and for travelers who truly love adventure and immersion in nature.
This style of camping strips away modern luxuries such as flush toilets, running water, and electricity, offering a raw and authentic bush experience.
Guests camp in simple canvas tents with nothing separating them from wildlife except the tent fabric and the glow of a campfire, creating an unforgettable sense of closeness to nature.
Daily life at camp is interactive — guests may watch meals being prepared, assist with cooking, or help with camp duties such as washing dishes.

After a full day of wildlife viewing — from predators hunting to prey grazing — guests retire knowing they will sleep in the same unfenced bush, guided only by torchlight and the sounds of the African night.
